Package sgraph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INode
    This interface represents all the operations offered by any type of node in our scenegraph.
    IScenegraph
    This interface captures all the operations that a scene graph should offer.
    IScenegraphRenderer
    This interface provides a general interface for the scene graph to use.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNode
    This abstract class implements the INode interface.
    GL3MeshRenderer
    This is a JOGL specific renderer for a mesh.
    GL3ScenegraphRenderer
    This is a scene graph renderer implementation that works specifically with the JOGL library It mandates OpenGL 3 and above.
    GroupNode
    This class represents a group node in the scenegraph.
    LeafNode
    This node represents the leaf of a scene graph.
    Scenegraph
    A specific implementation of this scene graph.
    SceneXMLReader
    A SAX parser for parsing the scene graph and compiling an IScenegraph object from it.
    TransformNode
    This node represents a transformation in the scene graph.
